info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 17 at 5:19PM EDT until September 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southwest Florida, including the following county, Lee.
* WHEN...Until 730 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.1 to 0.3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Palmona Park, McGregor, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, East Dunbar, Pine Manor, Matlacha, Burnt Store Marina, Suncoast Estates, Whiskey Creek, Page Field Airport, North Fort Myers, Page Park and Tice. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT THIS EVENING
